Kindergarten's New Playground

Location: Ancud, Chile
Date: 4/22/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

This colourful softfall surface can be found at a small kindergarten nestled near the Chilean coastline in the city of Ancud, situated on Chiloé Island. This area is renowned for its unique folklore, delectable cuisine, and distinctive architecture, drawing in tourists from all corners of the globe.The newly installed surface, made from durable Rosehill TPV® rubber, provides critical protection against common playground accidents. Designed to withstand the area’s wet and humid climate, it ensures longevity and safety. With a selection of 22 vivid colours, Rosehill TPV® offers endless possibilities for creating imaginative and engaging play areas that children will love.Thanks to <a href="https://www.fullurbano.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Full urbano</a>
